content.text: Our Implementation team can use this import to populate the PMs.
Do not change the column headers in Row 1 as this is used to complete the upload.
The table below lists the columns and which columns are required or optional.

Table 1:
Column Name | Column Required | Max Length | Notes
Maintenance Plan | Yes | 24 | Assets that get associated at this level will automatically be assigned all PMs tied to this MP. PMs can also be linked together within a maintenance plans so tasks carry over between them. PM | Yes | 24 | The frequency of the maintenance and specific tasks are associated at the PM level. Service Task | Yes | 24 | Specific items to be checked off by the technician when doing the preventive maintenance.
